alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coshocton; Harrison; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:17PM EDT until July 20 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Southwestern Carroll County in east central Ohio... Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 917 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Berlin, or near Millersburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, Dennison, Strasburg, Sugarcreek, Gnadenhutten, Tuscarawas, Bolivar, Baltic, Midvale, and Mineral City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
